items.content_html: 30 Days of photos starting tomorrow. Apologies, they won’t all be new or winners! I just need all of my Micro.blog pins! And need to backfill some for a future photos page!

items.content_html: More birthday presents to myself. Nuked my Twitter and Reddit accounts. I’d like to say I’m off big social but I still feel like I need a LinkedIn presence.
items.content_text: More birthday presents to myself. Nuked my Twitter and Reddit accounts. I'd like to say I'm off big social but I still feel like I need a LinkedIn presence.

items.content_html: If I must work and be in this meeting on my birthday there will be 🍺 and lottery tickets! 😂

items.content_html: New year, new shoes… 2023 Creamsicles!! 😆🏃🏻‍♂️
items.content_text: New year, new shoes… 2023 Creamsicles!! 😆🏃🏻‍♂️

items.content_html:
Oooooh! NOFX farewell tour coming to Tacoma! 100% there!

A bit of an evil approach though. Full weekend tix on sale now. Single day on sale later in the year if they don’t sell out via full weekend passes.

Still, last chance to see NOFX so ya gotta do what ya gotta do!
items.content_text:
Oooooh! [NOFX farewell tour](https://www.punkindrublicfest.com/tacoma) coming to Tacoma! 100% there!

A bit of an evil approach though. Full weekend tix on sale now. Single day on sale later in the year if they don't sell out via full weekend passes.

Still, last chance to see NOFX so ya gotta do what ya gotta do!

items.content_html: Moving back in! Test, test… 🐕
items.content_text: Moving back in! Test, test... 🐕

items.content_html:
Currently reading: How to Do Nothing: Resisting the Attention Economy by Jenny Odell 📚

Started reading this right before all the bird related drama started. Needless to say I’m failing at everything the book is about. Hoping to finish it off over the holidays and do better!
items.content_text:
